column2: Verify that the API returns status code: 200
Verify that the "created_at_max"  parameter is in the correct format and a valid date
Verify that the "created_at_max"  parameter is not data in the correct format and a valid date
Verify that the "created_at_max"  parameter is in the corect format and a future date
Verify that the "created_at_max"  parameter is not in the corect format
Verify that the "created_at_max"  parameter contains only numbers
Verify that the "created_at_max"  parameter contains uppercase letters, lowercase letters and special characters
Verify that the "created_at_min"  parameter is in the correct format and a valid date
Verify that the "created_at_min"  parameter is in the correct format and current day
Verify that the "created_at_min"  parameter is in the corect format and a future date
Verify that the "created_at_min"  parameter is not in the corect format
Verify that the "created_at_min"  parameter contains only numbers
Verify that the "created_at_min"  parameter contains uppercase letters, lowercase letters and special characters
Verify that  "created_at_max" and "created_at_min"  contain valid dates
Verify that  "created_at_max" and "created_at_min"  are not correct format
Verify that 'product_type' parameter is valid
Verify that 'product_type' parameter does not exsit
Verify that the 'product_type'  parameter contains uppercase letters, lowercase letters and special characters
Verify that the 'published_status'  parameter is  published
Verify that the 'published_status'  parameter is  unpublished with status : draft
Verify that the 'published_status'  parameter is  unpublished with status : archived
Verify that the 'published_status'  parameter is  any
Verify that the 'published_status'  parameter contains uppercase letters, lowercase letters and special characters
Verify that 'vendor' parameter is valid
Verify that 'vendor' parameter does not exsit
Verify that the 'vendor'  parameter contains uppercase letters, lowercase letters and special characters
